about_the_game:
====Coming Soon====

“You are the acting captain of the last war vessel of humanity.”

Maybe you are the last leader of all mankind.



👥Survivor👥

After the battle with the mysterious spaceship, Trident has torn apart, and you were appointed as the acting captain, succeeding the former captain who died.

🌆Civilization destroyed🏳️

You don't know why or how, but all human civilization has been annihilated, and the Trident is the last remaining warship of mankind.



🤼Fight or flight🏃

Battle the survivors' vigilantes, ruthless pirates, or cults using 3 types of realistic armaments: artillery, missiles, and fighters. In a post-apocalyptic world where a formidable civilization is aiming for the extinction of mankind, fighting between humans is not a good option, but there is no other way.

😈Enemy within🕵️

What if, after an unknown cause of fire and equipment failure, the mysterious spaceship periodically tracks the Trident? As a captain, you must always be on the lookout for and seek out imposters that might be hiding inside the ship.

☯️Karma☯️

The world is destroyed, and there is no law. You can become an outlaw and you have enough firepower and manpower to rob unarmed civilians. But at the same time, you can help them as the last remaining military commander. In addition, suspicious crew members can be summarily executed without an imposter test. But it does affect your karma, and this influence becomes the Butterfly Effect and makes a big difference. It's your call, captain.

🧑‍🤝‍🧑Crew🧑🏿‍🤝‍🧑🏽

Crew members are essential to the operation of the Trident, and if all crew members die, you lose. A crew's effectiveness is affected by morale, and if morale is too low, they may rebel.



🌏Finding a new home🌏

It's a run that seems like it'll never end, but you hope that someday you will find a new home in a safe zone where the crew of the Trident can lie down.




FEATURES
☣️ A dark survival in deep space
🚀 3 types of realistic strike weapons for war vessels: guns, missiles, and fighters.
🦋 Karma: Every decision you make becomes a butterfly effect
🪐 Explore a newly procedurally-generated galaxy every time
🗺️ 50+ unique text adventures with multiple choices
😒 Command and manage your crew members: morale, department heads, away team, diet, and even imposters.
📖 Sci-fi novel based storyline leading to 2 different endings
⚰️ 3 types of the game over scenarios in your command; No crew, No ship, and No leader(mutiny)
☠️ Breathtaking BVR(Beyond Visual Range) battle against pirates, vigilantes, and cults.
🎮 High replay value
